external_references.description: Hromcova, Z. and Burgher, A. (2023, September 21). OilRig’s Outer Space and Juicy Mix: Same ol’ rig, new drill pipes. Retrieved November 21, 2024.

objects.description: [Mango](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1169) contains an unused capability to block endpoint security solutions from loading user-mode code hooks via a DLL in a specified process by using the `UpdateProcThreadAttribute API` to set the `PROC_THREAD_ATTRIBUTE_MITIGATION_POLICY` to `PROCESS_CREATION_MITIGATION_POLICY_BLOCK_NON_MICROSOFT_BINARIES_ALWAYS_ON` for an identified process. (Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
